com.genband.kandy.api.services.calls

Interface IKandyCall

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IKandyIncomingCall, IKandyOutgoingCall

    public interface IKandyCall
    This interface is used to initiate a voice or video call.

    When the call has been established, a call object is generated and various actions can be taken on this object. These include:

    • hangup/transfer
    • hold/unhold
    • video sharing - start/stop
    • switch camera
    • mute/unmute
    • get the call ID/state/type/callee
    • get timing info. start/end/duration/

      • sendDTMF

        void sendDTMF(char tone)
        Inserts Dual Tone Multi Frequency Signal to sending queue and returns the success
        Parameters:
        tone - The character value of DTMF tone. Can only be 0,1...,9,*,#,a,b,c,d,A,B,C,D;
